channel.title: My Mod Idea
channel.description:
I thought of a mod kind of similar to Portal. It's a puzzle mod with some fighting. You are in an old broken-down haunted mansion full of traps and dead ends. You can press a button to temporarily turn the mansion back into what it looked like in its prime. Kind of like this: [url='https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1Et3nH_6odk']Go to about 1:08[/url]. You have to use this ability to get past all kinds of puzzles and help you fight enemies a lot [url='https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LAiLkJ4impM']like this.[/url] And maybe you can have some telekinesis abilities to make things more interesting.
So what do you guys think?

item.title: My Mod Idea
item.dc:creator: Acristoff
item.description:
I would help with mapping or programming but I’m involved in my own project that’s eating up my time like a fat kid at a hot dog eating contest.

Read full topic

item.title: My Mod Idea
item.dc:creator: garrthbarrttinn
item.description:
Ibanez:

So, basically, PoP: Warrior Within set in a haunted house? Sign me up!

Lol.

I came up with new idea. Have the mod start out with you walking into a room and the ceiling collapses or a chandelier falls on you or something. You then pass out and wake up in some place deep in the mansion. At the end of the game, you return to the room you started out in and find your dead body there perhaps with paramedics and an ambulance and maybe a grieving relative, a lot like The Sixth Sense.

Read full topic

item.title: My Mod Idea
item.dc:creator: DinoThrasher
item.description:
Grey Acumen:

Or ocarina of time.

Reminds me a bit more of the Temple of Time from “Twilight Princess”.

I wish I could map/mod/texture/model, but I don’t have the patience to teach myself.

This does sound like fun, though. I would like to see it happen.

Read full topic

item.description:
If there were some textures modellers mappers and maybe one or two coders, I doubt this would be a very difficult mod to make. I can map decently, is there anyone else interested?

item.title: My Mod Idea

item.description:
Sounds a lot like Metroid Prime 2: Echoes as well. Light world, dark world stuff.

Read full topic

item.title: My Mod Idea
item.dc:creator: Grey_Acumen
item.description:
sounds like Soul Reaver.

Or ocarina of time.

Mostly soul reaver though.

But yes, I’ve actually considered this exact type of gameplay mechanic where you have to go back and forth between the run down and prime versions in order to get through, and even move objects in the prime world so that you can find them again after the place has been run down. Or find objects in the run down world that had been lost from the prime world. etc. Possibilities are quite extensive.

Read full topic

I thought of a mod kind of similar to Portal. It’s a puzzle mod with some fighting. You are in an old broken-down haunted mansion full of traps and dead ends. You have to use this ability to get past all kinds of puzzles and help you fight enemies a lot like this. And maybe you can have some telekinesis abilities to make things more interesting.
